title: Agile Project Manager
education: Bachelor’s (BA/BS) degree in Business, Management Information Systems, Computer Science, or a related field is required or the equivalent of 8 years of Project Management experience.
scope: The Project Manager will work directly with an internal team as well as (at times) vendors and third-party partners to develop joint project plans for our integration projects. Other duties of the Project Manager include planning and submitting recommendations to resolve discrepancies, taking action on issues of non-compliance, keeping lines of communication open among all project stakeholders, tracking deliverables, milestones and any decisions made regarding the request for changes and outstanding items.
description:
Orange Bees is a leader in the upstate region of South Carolina for its world-class software development. Established in 2013, Orange Bees, aim to improve the manufacturing, insurance, financial, association, and retail industries; where we have an extensive track record of success in Product Engineering, Enterprise Management, System Integration, Mobile Application Development, Web Application Development, and Data Analytics.

Our client, an innovative automotive manufacturing company, is looking for a talented individual for an opportunity in the Greenville/Spartanburg Area of South Carolina. This position is a long-term contract position with the possibility of multi-year extension and conversion to a full-time/permanent position.
responsibilities: Develop global standards for project management; project templates, status reporting, and governance.
Facilitate periodic stage gate reviews. Participate in a project governance team.
Responsible for key deliverables such as timely communication of project milestones, status reporting, change requests, and budget performance.
Responsible for meetings and planning sessions at various stages of the project lifecycle, as required.
Promote project management best practices; train IT and other functional groups on PM methodologies.
Work closely with business leaders and remain actively involved in sponsor/stakeholder management.
Establish and implement project management best practices.
Work with teams in resolving discrepancies, removing or mitigating roadblocks, acting on issues of non-compliance, and facilitating communication among all project stakeholders.
Ensure effective tracking of outstanding deliverables, milestones, and change requests. Provide regular status updates to project stakeholders.
experience: Must have Agile project management experience, Scale Agile Methodology experience a big plus
Experience with Atlassian Toolset is a big plus
Any PM or Scrum Master certifications are a plus
Project Management Professional (PMP) Designation is preferred.
Plus 4 years of hands-on experience in project management, including expertise with project management tools.
knowledge: Strong organization and time management skills.
Highly developed and influential communication, facilitation and presentation skills.
Team player with proven ability to facilitate project delivery through high-functioning teams.
Ability to scope and size work efforts effectively.
Ability to lead ad hoc teams of bright and highly motivated individuals.

title: JAVA Developer
education: BA/BS in Information Technology or Computer Science plus TWO years of working experience in IT Application Development or the equivalent of 6 years professional experience in IT Applications development and support
scope: We are looking for a Java Developer with a high level of MVC Development experience and Spring experience is a plus. The person in this role must be system oriented with a strong ability to estimate and execute software tasks from inception to deployment. They must have Java REST endpoint development skills and must know some Java Script.
description: Orange Bees is a leader in the upstate region of South Carolina for its world-class software development. Established in 2013, Orange Bees, aim to improve the manufacturing, insurance, financial, association, and retail industries; where we have an extensive track record of success in Product Engineering, Enterprise Management, System Integration, Mobile Application Development, Web Application Development, and Data Analytics.
responsibilities: Serves as a primary point of contact for other engineers and specialists in the team to provide expert knowledge and troubleshooting skills.
Works on several development initiatives concurrently and provide subject matter expertise on customer implementations and product customization.
Partners with other developers to develop functionality following existing style and coding standards.
Reviews designs, demo prototypes and provides application support.
Defines the visualization and realization of future technologies.
Serves as an internal consultant to other developers and engineers as needed, providing assistance in all phases of product life-cycle development.
Maintains accurate, meaningful and updated technical and non-technical documentation pertaining to all aspects of area(s) of responsibility.
Analyzes business critical processes, evaluates and recommends improvements.
Work closely with the architecture team for the design and review of development projects to ensure the work is in line with the overall design and strategy
Participate in an Agile team and be actively involved in the full software development life cycle
Develop new and improve existing processes
Create and perform unit tests and test automation
experience: Experience working in an Agile environment
Minimum 2 years’ experience working in a team-oriented, collaborative environment.
2+ years of technical experience in Information Technology.
1+ years of experience in web with demonstrated strengths in software development, integration, and testing
2+ years of experience developing enterprise or client facing web applications.
2+ years of experience interfacing with REST endpoint development
2+ years of experience with Object oriented programming (Javascript).
Process/project management experience or training/certifications (preferred).
knowledge: Java MVC Development (spring is a plus)
Must have Java REST endpoint development experience
Value experience more than formal education for this one

title: Senior Full-Stack Web Developer
education: BA/BS in Information Technology or Computer Science or the equivalent of 4 years professional experience in IT Applications development and support
scope: We are looking for a full-stack developer with a high level of node.js and Angular 2+ experience. The person in this role must be system oriented with a strong ability to estimate and execute software tasks from inception to deployment. They must also be a strong programmer with more than 6 years of experience in writing code. Designs and develops overall architecture for web application using leading edge technologies and know-how from Industry, partner companies, local universities and internal partners into automotive concepts.

responsibilities: Design, develop, and implement JavaScript solutions leveraging Node.js for web applications.
Defines and documents the design of functionality through use cases, business process flows, UI design, and UML modeling as necessary.

experience: Node.js experience is the key to this one, need high level of node experience
Angular 2+ experience. Need basic knowledge and willingness to learn more advanced angular skills
Value experience more than formal education
Experience developing RESTful APIs
Experience working in an Agile environment
2+ years of technical experience in Information Technology.
2+ years of experience in web with demonstrated strengths in software development, integration, and testing
1+ years of experience deploying and supporting Web applications.
1+ years of experience interfacing with REST Web Services and JSON/XML
1+ years of experience monitoring and supporting performance of web applications and infrastructure.
knowledge: Knowledge of object oriented programming (Objective C, C++, Javascript).
Basic knowledge of Linux Server administration, Version Control Systems.

title: Senior Java Engineer
education: BA/BS in Information Technology or Computer Science plus 6 years of working experience in IT Application Development or the equivalent of 10 years professional experience in IT Applications development and support
scope: We are looking for a Senior Java Enigneer with a high level of knowledge in writing Java REST API’s, Apache Camel, Large-Scale enterprise application experience, any front-end JavaScript experience and GraphQL experience or willingness to learn. The person in this role must be system oriented with a strong ability to estimate and execute software tasks from inception to deployment. They must have Java REST API development skills and must know some Java Script.
